item.title: Economic weighting and scoring methods: PCA, CRITIC, EWM
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Economic weighting and scoring methods: PCA, CRITIC, EWM, COV. Also, some common pitfalls are recorded.

item.title: Microeconomics: Roy Hotelling Shephard
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: This document explores the economic formulas associated with Roy, Hotelling, and Shephard. These theories are utilized as methods for solving problems in a textbook but are not covered in another reference book, hence they are documented here as supplementary material.
